title: Software Engineer - Java
description:
We are looking for a Software Engineer (Java) experience in developing robust, scalable web applications using Java Spring Boot and Angular. This role plays a key part in enhancing our next\\-generation content delivery platform, with a focus on backend and frontend development, enterprise search, and data analytics integration.
   

  

**About You ‚Äì Experience, Education, Skills, And Accomplishments**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Minimum 1 years of Java development experience with strong backend skills.
* Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, REST APIs, and microservices architecture.
* Hands\\-on with application servers (Tomcat, JBoss), SQL/NoSQL databases, and query optimization.
* Experience with testing frameworks (JUnit, TestNG) and TDD/BDD practices.


**It would be great if you also had . .** 
 .
   

  

* Experience with Elastic Search for implementing and optimizing search functionalities.
* Familiarity with Redis for caching and performance optimization.
* Familiar with CI/CD pipelines, Git, Maven/Gradle, and cloud/container tools like Docker, Kubernetes, AWS/Azure/GCP.
* Ability to integrate new technologies to improve systems and processes.


**What will you be doing in this role?**
* Collaborate with Data Engineering and DevOps teams to implement CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins.
* Utilize Swagger for documenting APIs and Webhooks for seamless system integrations.
* Implement solutions using Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, REST APIs, and microservices.
* Write high\\-quality, maintainable, and reusable code following engineering best practices (SOLID, DRY, TDD).
* Develop and execute unit tests, integration tests, and support automation frameworks.


**About The Team**
 You‚Äôll join Health base, a high\\-impact team building the industry's most intelligent affiliations platform for the Life Sciences and Healthcare sector. We empower market access teams with precise, provider\\-level insights to understand healthcare system alignments and IDN influence across U.S. regions. Our globally distributed team delivers innovative, data\\-driven solutions using agile and DevOps practices.
   

  

**Hours of Work**
 40\\-hours per week, permanent full\\-time position, IST time zone
   

  

 At Clarivate, we are committed to providing equal employment opportunities for all qualified persons with respect to hiring, compensation, promotion, training, and other terms, conditions, and privileges of employment. We comply with applicable laws and regulations governing non\\-discrimination in all locations.

title: Software Engineer
description:
At
 
**Hemut** 

 , we‚Äôre rethinking how logistics should work, using software that is fast, intelligent, and built to handle the real\\-world chaos of freight. We‚Äôre building AI\\-powered systems that automate operations, optimize routes, and turn dispatching from guesswork into a data\\-driven process.
 




  






 As a
 
**Software Engineer** 

 at Hemut, you‚Äôll join a small, high\\-impact team where everyone ships production code, contributes to architecture decisions, and pushes the boundaries of what modern logistics technology can do. You‚Äôll work across
 
**APIs** 

 ,
 
**web interfaces** 

 ,
 
**AI integrations** 

 , and
 
**data pipelines** 

 , creating the systems that keep freight moving efficiently and reliably.
 




  





  





  





**The Hemut Story and a** 
 Quick Intro
 



  




* Cheema (Founder \\& CEO) started in trucking at
 **16 years old** 
 as a means to
 **escape homelessness** 
 , eventually scaling to
 **management of a 12\\-truck fleet**
* **Afterwards, he gained further experience in logistics and international shipping** 
 through starting an ethnic grocery store and restaurant
* **12 months ago, Cheema founded Hemut** 
 to solve the inefficiencies he faced during his 6 years in trucking with the new AI capabilities that were becoming available
* He
 **sold the restaurant and grocery store to bootstrap Hemut** 
 , and gained acceptance into YC
* **Now looking for motivated individuals to grow alongside the company** 
 for the next 10 years and
 **make a real impact**



  





**Tech Stack** 




  




* **Frontend:** 
 Next.js, React Native, Tailwind CSS, WebSocket/Socket.io
* **Backend:** 
 FastAPI, Pydantic, JWT, Celery \\+ Redis
* **Database:** 
 PostgreSQL, Redis, S3\\-compatible storage
* **AI/ML:** 
 RAG pipelines, Pinecone, OpenAI APIs, LangChain
* **Voice/Automation:** 
 Vapi, Twilio, ElevenLabs, N8N
* **Cloud \\& Infra:** 
 AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, SageMaker), Docker, GitHub Actions, Terraform



  





**Responsibilities** 




  




* Design, develop, and maintain production\\-grade web and backend systems
* Implement real\\-time communication systems and WebSocket\\-based APIs
* Architect and optimize database schemas, search, and caching layers
* Build and integrate AI\\-driven features into Hemut‚Äôs logistics and automation stack
* Collaborate on architectural decisions and contribute to system scalability and reliability
* Conduct code reviews, write tests, and ensure high\\-quality engineering standards
* Participate in DevOps operations including deployment automation, monitoring, and debugging
* Research and implement emerging tools or frameworks that improve performance and productivity



  





**Qualifications** 




  




* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience
* Proficiency in Python (FastAPI preferred), JavaScript/TypeScript, and SQL
* Experience with REST APIs, async programming, and scalable system design
* Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS preferred) and containerization (Docker)
* Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and backend architecture
* Bonus: Exposure to AI/ML integrations, vector databases, or workflow automation tools
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and ability to work independently in a remote team



  





**Why Hemut?** 




  




* **Impact:** 
 Your work directly shapes the infrastructure used by real\\-world logistics operators
* **Ownership:** 
 Build full\\-stack features end\\-to\\-end and see them go live
* **Mentorship:** 
 Work directly with founders and senior engineers who value speed and clarity
* **Innovation:** 
 Be part of a team merging AI reasoning with logistics automation
* **Growth:** 
 Learn system design, architecture, and modern scaling techniques
* **Culture:** 
 Remote\\-friendly, fast\\-moving, and built around collaboration and learning



  





**If you‚Äôre passionate about building production systems that combine engineering precision with AI innovation, Hemut is where you‚Äôll make an impact. Apply today!**

title: Senior UiPath Developer
description:
**Job Category:** 
 Development
   

  

**Job Type:** 
 Full Time
   

  

**Job Location:** 
 Bengaluru
   

  

**Years of Experience:** 
 5\\-7
   

  

**Job Title:** 
 Senior UiPath Developer
   

  

**Company:** 
 WizzyBox Private Limited
   

  

**Location:** 
 Bangalore, India
   

  

**Experience Required:** 
 5‚Äì7 Years
   

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-time
   

  

**About WizzyBox**
 WizzyBox Private Limited is a fast\\-growing technology company focused on delivering intelligent automation and digital transformation solutions. We combine innovation, efficiency, and cutting\\-edge technologies to help organizations optimize business operations. We are looking for an experienced
 **Senior UiPath Developer** 
 to lead automation initiatives, design scalable RPA solutions, and mentor the development team in driving end\\-to\\-end automation delivery.
   

  

**Roles And Responsibilities**
* Lead the design, development, and deployment of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions using UiPath.
* Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to identify automation opportunities and define technical feasibility.
* Develop and maintain reusable components, libraries, and frameworks for automation.
* Review code and ensure adherence to best practices, coding standards, and security guidelines.
* Manage UiPath Orchestrator configurations, robot scheduling, and monitoring.
* Integrate UiPath workflows with APIs, databases, and third\\-party applications.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize existing automation processes for improved efficiency and scalability.
* Document process definitions, solution designs, and technical specifications.
* Provide mentorship and technical guidance to junior RPA developers.
* Stay updated with the latest UiPath features, RPA trends, and AI/ML integrations for automation enhancement.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related discipline.
* 5‚Äì7 years of experience in RPA development, with at least 3\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in UiPath.
* Expertise in UiPath Studio, Orchestrator, and RE Framework.
* Strong understanding of RPA concepts, process design, and automation lifecycle management.
* Proficiency in VB.NET, C\\#, or Python scripting for automation customization.
* Experience in integrating RPA solutions with ERP, CRM, and other enterprise systems.
* Solid knowledge of SQL databases and data manipulation.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and documentation skills.


**Good to Have**
* UiPath Advanced Developer Certification (Ui ARD) or RPA Solution Architect certification.
* Exposure to Document Understanding, AI Center, Action Center, or Task Mining in UiPath.
* Experience with Power Automate, Automation Anywhere, or other RPA tools.
* Familiarity with Azure, AWS, or GCP for cloud\\-based automation deployments.
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices for RPA.


**Perks \\& Benefits**
* Competitive compensation and performance\\-based bonuses.
* Comprehensive health insurance and employee wellness programs.
* Certification sponsorship and continuous learning opportunities.
* Opportunity to lead enterprise\\-level automation projects.
* Collaborative and innovation\\-driven work culture.
